participant_2.background:
I'm not comfortable sharing my ethnic background.
last season i was just getting started.
my favorite food is mashed potatoes.
i am the youngest of five.
i write fiction for fun.

content.text: Hey there, I'm going to a horror movie marathon with my friends to support a local charity, what are you up to?
Hey, I'm just getting started writing fiction for fun, what kind of horror movies do you like?
I like slashers and psychological thrillers, what kind of fiction do you write?
I write science fiction and fantasy, I'm trying to get into horror though.
Cool, I've always wanted to try writing fiction, but I'm not sure where to start.
There are a lot of great resources online to help you get started, I'd be happy to share some with you if you're interested.
That would be great, thanks! I'm always looking for new ways to learn.
No problem, I'll send you a link to some articles and websites that helped me get started.
Awesome, thanks! I'm excited to check them out.
Me too, hopefully they'll be helpful.
You're welcome, I hope you enjoy them.
